title: [Health] Scientists have found firearms are now the leading cause of death for children and adolescents 0-19 years of age, with a staggering 83 percent increase in youth firearm fatalities over the past decade

[Neuroscience] Researchers have found a previously undiscovered pathway that may help explain the mysterious antidepressant effects of ketamine. And if the mechanisms in the brain that ketamine influences are discovered, new drugs could be developed to target the beneficial antidepressant effect specifically
